TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Chad, title = Chad, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chad} }

S.FORM: Chad Chad i Africa a kanatal, u bunak amin i labu nu kanatal, sakamu sa ku taw" mapatayay a balucu' i Africa". inayi' ku bayu' i kanatal. caledes ku demiad hamin a mihca. u siwkay nu kanatal u Chad sa i labu nu Africa, itiza i 15 00 N, 19 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 1.284 million km2 u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 1,259,200 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 24,800 km2 hamin nu tademaw sa 11,852,462. kakalukan umah sa 39.60%, kilakilangan umah sa 9.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 51.30%. Chad masakaputay a kanatal , ngangan u Chad han, (u imi aca, A-la-buo a kamu, تشاد‎ Tšād; Fa-kou a kamu, Tchad /'tʃæd/) nu Fay-cou tepanay lalabuay nu kanatal, nuamisan mitules tu Li-pi-ya nuwalian mitules tu Su-tan atu nu timulan nu Central african republic , satipan nutimulan nababiyaw tu Ce-may-lung, Nay-ci-li-ya, satipan atu Ni-zea kanatal u kalikeluhan, malikeluh. uyni u Chad a kakitizaan u tepan nu Fey-zou, mabatad ku bayu, paymihcaan caledes ku demiad, satu u lala' nu kanatal kakitizaan u likelikenan namin, sisa pangangan han tu "mapatayay a balucu' nu Fey-zou han". (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Tšād; 法語:Tchad i/'tʃæd/), ".) tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u N'Djamena . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 11 bulad 8 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Mahamat Déby, micakat a demiad sa i 1990 a mihca 12 bulad 2 demiad. u cunli nu Chad ayza sa ci Albert Pahimi Padacké, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 4 bulad 26 demiad. u hata u kulit nu hata nu Chad sa, izaw ku tulu a kulit, u cunusay a semilaway, u cunusay a takuliway atu sumanahay. u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam: 查德 u sulit nu Lipun: チャド共和国 u sulit nu Amilika: Chad laylay ayaw nu celah tu 7,000 a mihcaan, Chad nuwamisan a kakitizaan mulangaway mauzipay i hekal, mapadang ku nuenengay nu tademaw , satusa uynian ka kamihcaan i tiniay a kakitizaan saicelang malahat ku tademaw,Chad uyzaan kahenulan maazih ku kasumamadan nisubelidan , a tuud, angangan tuni i Bo-el-ku-en-ney-di-ti-be-se a kakitizaan) taneng talaayaw nu katukuh ayaw nu celah tu ayaw nu 2000 a mihcaan. namakay yayaw nu celah tu 7000 a mihcaan malingatu izaw tu sabelen sa ku tademaw i Chadan saupu sa nueneng, katukuh kakilul tu 9 a kasumamadan a mihcaan, kakilulkilul tu sakuwan i Chad nu Sa-ha-la a kakitizaan pakakat atu malawpes, uheni amin naemec milakuwit tunian a kakitizaan miawas tu Sa-ha-la a zazan nu sapaliwan tu tuud. Chad i 1920 a mihcan maala nu Fa-kuo, mala u Fa-kuo tungusay telecilal nu Fay-couan, 1960 a mihcaan, Chad i Fu-lang-suo-wa-tuo-mu-pa-pa-ye anikelidan makay Fa-kuo a misateked , nika Tuo-mu-ba-ba-ye a lalekuan malilid ku nuwamisanay a Mu-si-lin a kakitizaan caay katanengen , sazikuzay i 1965 a mihcaan sasacacay sa amabuwah tu katanaya nu ngangayaw nu lalabuay,1979 a mihcaan, mibelihay a cenbu tu hitay ami tebung tu En-cian-na, mapahezek tu nutimulan tunisakaku pikuwan. nika upabelihay tu cenbu u hitay mikeliday sakakaay a hitayan macaculi ku lalabuay, sazikuzay ci Hay-san-ha-pu-lel pakademec tu nika ngangayawan tahkal satu mala cung-tun,nika i1990 a mihcaan mapabelin nica ku sakakaay a hitay ci Yy-de-li-se-de-pi, 2003 a mihcaan malingatu, Su-tam satipan macacukah i a ci Ta-bu, satu Chad a lilis a kanatal caay katanektek ku kawaw nu kanatal. u hulic pabeli ci Chad tu cacay a sakuwan tu tabakiay nu a kawaw, cung-tung ci Chad u satalakaway nu mukeliday nu kanatal,situngus mikawaw tu cung-tung atu tabang a tademaw sakaput a tademaw nu mikawaway nu cence, pakay pahulicay miliclicay, u talakaway a hitay, kakatizaan a mikuwanay a tademaw atu kanatalay a u pabay nu pakusiay mikawaw tabaki ku ku kalilid . yu tabaki ku kakenuhan a kawaw, cung-tung i ku-min-i-huay amatatengil hawsa taneng amipasakamu tu mahiniay u kacenuhan sasakalahay a tukian a kawaw, Cung-tung u binawlan ku misingkiway lima a mihcacan mala cung-tung, 2005 a mihcaan Chad maawas ku baluhay a nupahulican, papiales tu nu cung-tung tulas kala cung-tungan. i ayaw cung-tung cinacacay dada' batilin kinacacay mala cung-tung, ci Te-bi a cung-tung u angangan u pipalitaan uyzaamin Za-cia-wa a tademaw ,uyzaamin makaiay a sakaput atu timulay paybinacadan i cenbu izawamin i cenbu daysiw, u maanubay i Chad a kanatal atumahiniay , mahapingan ku kitakit i 2005 a mihcaan patahkal tu tamelacay a nisulitan mucel kubalucu' nisulitan paazih Chad a kanatal i kitakit amin u maanubay a pihacengay a kanatal, , 2006 a mihcaan kahini adidi kunikasumat. Chad a hulic patizeng i Fa-kou a tademawan a hulic min-fa atu Chad tunu kasumamadan a hulic, zikuzan satu cayay tu kapipikuwan tu kapulungan a tunipisilut atu hulic paleca tu pidiput, kanahatu u hulic paaning tu Chad misadekeday a kawaw tunu huingay a hulic, nika hamin u kahenulan nu huing a hulic tademaw nu u cung-tung amin kusitungusay satalakaway a huing atu u cung-tung mikawaway. talakaway a huing atu pahulicay a wiy-yun-huay u Chad u satalakaway pasakaput nu huing a hulic , satalakaway a huing cacay a tademawan makay u sakakaay nu huing sakakaay nu huing atu nu zumaay a sakapuaa sabw lima ku tademaw, pakay sakaput a tademaw makay i Tung-tung atu kou-min huy-i ku situngusay, tahadikud ku kal Cung-tung a lekec. pahulicay a wiyen huy siwaay a tademaw ka pulung tu miliclicay, sawa ku kala Tung-tung, wiye huy izaw situngus tu hulic, katatelekan atu kitakit tu ni kakaletekan mikawaw taayaw a mikinsa tu sakuwanan. Chad maha u kananatal a nikenisan lasic tu 22 a kakitizaan, uynian a zazan i 2003 a mihcaan a kakitizaan a kasilacan a mikawaw, mikutay tu nuyanay tu a kenis tu sabaw sepat, paykakitizaan izaw amin ku cacay Tung-tung ku mikayawaw tu sakakaay nu mikelitay. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) hekal a lala' Chad malatulu ku mahapingan hekal lala' a kakitizaan, nuwamisan u Sa-ha-la-sa-mu a kakitizaan. tepanay a kakitizaan atu nuwamisan Su-tan nalinabuan a kakitizaan. Chad malalasid tu tuluay angangan nu hekal a lala' kenis, nuwamisan nu likelikenan a kakitizaan nu tunusay u caledesay likelikenan a demiad, tepanay makedal ku Sa-he-el a kakitizaan, tungusay caledesay nu nalinabuwan a demiad atu nutimulan u sidemekay nu Su-dan a nalinabuwan nalinabuwan a kakitizaan, tungusay a caledesay kilangkilangan a demiad, uynian a kanatal u Chad a taku a nupangangan kanatalay sakatalakaway a buyu' tini i Sa-ha-la a Cu-si a buyu', kahenulan a tuse atu satabakiay a tuse u En-cang-na. Chad a kanatal pulung malakuwi tu 200 nu binacadan, Fa-kuo a kamu atu A-la-po a kamu u kanatalay a kamu, Yi-se-lan-ciaw u sayadahay a singku nu tademaw. Chad yadah u masazumaay a binacadan a kamu, yadah ku kasumamadan nisubelid a lalangawan. Chad cenbu sapilisak patiyak tu cenbu sakalah micucuh tu kunuan kasumamadan atu lalangawan nu kanatal, patahekal tu nu Chad a kanatal piazihan tu tuud nu kasumamadan atu Chad pasaupuan tu lalangawan . (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .)

Chad Chad i Africa a kanatal, o bonak amin i labo no kanatal, sakamo sa ko taw" mapatayay a baloco' i Africa". inayi' ko bayo' i kanatal. caledes ko demiad hamin a mihca. o siwkay no kanatal o Chad sa i labo no Africa, itiza i 15 00 N, 19 00 E o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 1.284 million km2 o ahebal no lala'ay sa 1,259,200 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 24,800 km2 hamin no tademaw sa 11,852,462. kakalokan omah sa 39.60%, kilakilangan omah sa 9.10%, zomaay henay omah sa 51.30%. Chad masakapotay a kanatal , ngangan o Chad han, (o imi aca, A-la-boo a kamo, تشاد‎ Tšād; Fa-koo a kamo, Tchad /'tʃæd/) no Fay-coo tepanay lalaboay no kanatal, noamisan mitoles to Li-pi-ya nowalian mitoles to So-tan ato no timolan no Central african repoblic , satipan notimolan nababiyaw to Ce-may-long, Nay-ci-li-ya, satipan ato Ni-zea kanatal o kalikelohan, malikeloh. oyni o Chad a kakitizaan o tepan no Fey-zoo, mabatad ko bayo, paymihcaan caledes ko demiad, sato o lala' no kanatal kakitizaan o likelikenan namin, sisa pangangan han to "mapatayay a baloco' no Fey-zoo han". (o kamo no Holam sa: Tšād; 法語:Tchad i/'tʃæd/), ".) tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o N'Djamena . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 11 bolad 8 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Mahamat Déby, micakat a demiad sa i 1990 a mihca 12 bolad 2 demiad. o conli no Chad ayza sa ci Albert Pahimi Padacké, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 4 bolad 26 demiad. o hata o kolit no hata no Chad sa, izaw ko tolo a kolit, o conosay a semilaway, o conosay a takoliway ato somanahay. o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam: 查德 o solit no Lipon: チャド共和国 o solit no Amilika: Chad laylay ayaw no celah to 7,000 a mihcaan, Chad nowamisan a kakitizaan molangaway maozipay i hekal, mapadang ko noenengay no tademaw , satosa oynian ka kamihcaan i tiniay a kakitizaan saicelang malahat ko tademaw,Chad oyzaan kahenolan maazih ko kasomamadan nisobelidan , a tood, angangan toni i Bo-el-ko-en-ney-di-ti-be-se a kakitizaan) taneng talaayaw no katokoh ayaw no celah to ayaw no 2000 a mihcaan. namakay yayaw no celah to 7000 a mihcaan malingato izaw to sabelen sa ko tademaw i Chadan saopo sa noeneng, katokoh kakilol to 9 a kasomamadan a mihcaan, kakilolkilol to sakowan i Chad no Sa-ha-la a kakitizaan pakakat ato malawpes, oheni amin naemec milakowit tonian a kakitizaan miawas to Sa-ha-la a zazan no sapaliwan to tood. Chad i 1920 a mihcan maala no Fa-koo, mala o Fa-koo tongosay telecilal no Fay-cooan, 1960 a mihcaan, Chad i Fo-lang-soo-wa-too-mo-pa-pa-ye anikelidan makay Fa-koo a misateked , nika Too-mo-ba-ba-ye a lalekoan malilid ko nowamisanay a Mo-si-lin a kakitizaan caay katanengen , sazikozay i 1965 a mihcaan sasacacay sa amabowah to katanaya no ngangayaw no lalaboay,1979 a mihcaan, mibelihay a cenbo to hitay ami tebong to En-cian-na, mapahezek to notimolan tonisakako pikowan. nika opabelihay to cenbo o hitay mikeliday sakakaay a hitayan macacoli ko lalaboay, sazikozay ci Hay-san-ha-po-lel pakademec to nika ngangayawan tahkal sato mala cong-ton,nika i1990 a mihcaan mapabelin nica ko sakakaay a hitay ci Yy-de-li-se-de-pi, 2003 a mihcaan malingato, So-tam satipan macacokah i a ci Ta-bo, sato Chad a lilis a kanatal caay katanektek ko kawaw no kanatal. o holic pabeli ci Chad to cacay a sakowan to tabakiay no a kawaw, cong-tong ci Chad o satalakaway no mokeliday no kanatal,sitongos mikawaw to cong-tong ato tabang a tademaw sakapot a tademaw no mikawaway no cence, pakay paholicay miliclicay, o talakaway a hitay, kakatizaan a mikowanay a tademaw ato kanatalay a o pabay no pakosiay mikawaw tabaki ko ko kalilid . yo tabaki ko kakenohan a kawaw, cong-tong i ko-min-i-hoay amatatengil hawsa taneng amipasakamo to mahiniay o kacenohan sasakalahay a tokian a kawaw, Cong-tong o binawlan ko misingkiway lima a mihcacan mala cong-tong, 2005 a mihcaan Chad maawas ko balohay a nopaholican, papiales to no cong-tong tolas kala cong-tongan. i ayaw cong-tong cinacacay dada' batilin kinacacay mala cong-tong, ci Te-bi a cong-tong o angangan o pipalitaan oyzaamin Za-cia-wa a tademaw ,oyzaamin makaiay a sakapot ato timolay paybinacadan i cenbo izawamin i cenbo daysiw, o maanobay i Chad a kanatal atomahiniay , mahapingan ko kitakit i 2005 a mihcaan patahkal to tamelacay a nisolitan mocel kobaloco' nisolitan paazih Chad a kanatal i kitakit amin o maanobay a pihacengay a kanatal, , 2006 a mihcaan kahini adidi konikasomat. Chad a holic patizeng i Fa-koo a tademawan a holic min-fa ato Chad tono kasomamadan a holic, zikozan sato cayay to kapipikowan to kapolongan a tonipisilot ato holic paleca to pidipot, kanahato o holic paaning to Chad misadekeday a kawaw tono hoingay a holic, nika hamin o kahenolan no hoing a holic tademaw no o cong-tong amin kositongosay satalakaway a hoing ato o cong-tong mikawaway. talakaway a hoing ato paholicay a wiy-yon-hoay o Chad o satalakaway pasakapot no hoing a holic , satalakaway a hoing cacay a tademawan makay o sakakaay no hoing sakakaay no hoing ato no zomaay a sakapoaa sabw lima ko tademaw, pakay sakapot a tademaw makay i Tong-tong ato koo-min hoy-i ko sitongosay, tahadikod ko kal Cong-tong a lekec. paholicay a wiyen hoy siwaay a tademaw ka polong to miliclicay, sawa ko kala Tong-tong, wiye hoy izaw sitongos to holic, katatelekan ato kitakit to ni kakaletekan mikawaw taayaw a mikinsa to sakowanan. Chad maha o kananatal a nikenisan lasic to 22 a kakitizaan, oynian a zazan i 2003 a mihcaan a kakitizaan a kasilacan a mikawaw, mikotay to noyanay to a kenis to sabaw sepat, paykakitizaan izaw amin ko cacay Tong-tong ko mikayawaw to sakakaay no mikelitay. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) hekal a lala' Chad malatolo ko mahapingan hekal lala' a kakitizaan, nowamisan o Sa-ha-la-sa-mo a kakitizaan. tepanay a kakitizaan ato nowamisan So-tan nalinaboan a kakitizaan. Chad malalasid to toloay angangan no hekal a lala' kenis, nowamisan no likelikenan a kakitizaan no tonosay o caledesay likelikenan a demiad, tepanay makedal ko Sa-he-el a kakitizaan, tongosay caledesay no nalinabowan a demiad ato notimolan o sidemekay no So-dan a nalinabowan nalinabowan a kakitizaan, tongosay a caledesay kilangkilangan a demiad, oynian a kanatal o Chad a tako a nopangangan kanatalay sakatalakaway a boyo' tini i Sa-ha-la a Co-si a boyo', kahenolan a tose ato satabakiay a tose o En-cang-na. Chad a kanatal polong malakowi to 200 no binacadan, Fa-koo a kamo ato A-la-po a kamo o kanatalay a kamo, Yi-se-lan-ciaw o sayadahay a singko no tademaw. Chad yadah o masazomaay a binacadan a kamo, yadah ko kasomamadan nisobelid a lalangawan. Chad cenbo sapilisak patiyak to cenbo sakalah micocoh to konoan kasomamadan ato lalangawan no kanatal, patahekal to no Chad a kanatal piazihan to tood no kasomamadan ato Chad pasaopoan to lalangawan . (o kamo no Holam sa: .)
